resources.string:
On a piece of paper write down a 3 or 4 digit number.

Make it completly random with lots of different digits, like 6289 or 4234.

Jumble up all the digits in your number to make another number.

So if you chose 6289 you could make 8926.

And now that you have two numbers, subtract the larger number from the smaller one.

Eg. 8926 - 6289 = 2637

Next draw a circle around one of the digits in your answer... (but don\'t pick 0 because that\'s already a circle)

Finally, jumble up all the number in your answer and type them in, except for the one you circled.

So if your answer was 2637 you could draw a circle around 3 and type in 267.

Hello,
I\'m one hand magician and I have the ability to guess the single digits of your chosen number

Want to let me read your mind ?
